item.description: JC_1 Jason Huang Choe, D., Lee, J. H., Yoo, M., Hwang, S., Sung, B. H., Cho, S., … & Cho, B. K. (2019). Adaptive laboratory evolution of a genome-reduced Escherichia coli. Nature communications, 10(1), 935. pdf link TAGS: adaptive laboratory evolution, systems biology, minimal genome , metabolism pathway rewire, Aleksashin, Nikolay A., et al. “Assembly and functionality of the ribosome with tethered subunits.” Nature communications 10.
